cause.description:
This cause is to support the fighting need to help the people of Darfur. This cause is intended to raise awareness to people who don't know the terrible acts genocide has on one country. Spread the word by inviting as many people as you know to help with this!
1. This must end. Let's unite and fight.
2. There isn't an individual that deserves to live a life that those individuals are living
3. Recruit as many as you can and know that the word of this is spreading
cause.mission: Help the fight to end the Genocide in Darfur
cause.name: Darfur Relief
